chart_description: This chart shows the number of threads running in each user group. Threads are the smallest units of processing in a system and too many of them can lead to performance degradation or even system crashes.  Monitoring this chart can help identify potential issues and optimize system performance.

dimension_descriptions.1000: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 1000.
dimension_descriptions.32: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 32.
dimension_descriptions.65532: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 65532.
dimension_descriptions.65535: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 65535.

dimension_descriptions.996: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 996.
dimension_descriptions.997: Number of threads in the group with numerical ID 997.
